LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

RecordTypeId.description: Represents the record type of the record.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Only Active Records that are to be relevant for display.

cgcloud__Dashboard_State__c.description: State of the dashboard and all its datasets. The state depends on user selection, start values, global filters, and external or initial filters that are applicable for the dataset.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Display_In__c.description: Indicates where the mobile link is shown in the mobile device.

cgcloud__Login_Host__c.description: URL that shows the login screen when the user is not logged in to the application.

cgcloud__Org_Id__c.description: ID of the organization that contains the content.

cgcloud__Record_Type_Name__c.description: Developer name of the record type.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales org to which the Deep Links belong.

cgcloud__Scheme_Name__c.description: Scheme component of the link to which the user will navigate on a mobility device.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: Sort Order of displayable deep links record within a call.

cgcloud__URL__c.description: Stores the web address to which the user can navigate by using a quick access cockpit card on a mobility device.
